name: Pineapple
desc: a tropical fruit known for its vibrant and spiky exterior, offers a perfect balance of sweetness and tanginess. With its juicy and succulent flesh, promoting immune health and bone strength.

name: Melon
desc: Packed with vitamins A and C, melon not only promotes skin health but also provides a delightful treat during hot summer days. Whether enjoyed in slices, scooped into fruit salads

name: Mango
desc: Bursting with vitamins A and C, mangoes offer a sweet and juicy indulgence that tantalizes the taste buds. Whether savored fresh, blended into smoothies, or featured in both sweet and savory dishes

name: Apple
desc: Packed with dietary fiber and essential nutrients, apples contribute to digestive health and overall well-being. Whether enjoyed as a convenient, on-the-go snack, sliced in salads,

name: Strawberry
desc: Whether enjoyed fresh as a standalone treat, blended into smoothies, or featured in desserts and salads, strawberries bring a burst of freshness and a touch of natural sweetness to culinary creations.

name: Banana
desc: Packed with essential nutrients, bananas contribute to heart health and provide a quick energy boost. Whether enjoyed on its own as a portable snack, sliced onto cereal
